response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a rate that represents a significant savings compared to its market value of $10,000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 9500}
